Package it.polimi.ingsw.Client.View.TUI.ViewStates

Class ComplexState

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.Client.View.TUI.ViewStates.ViewState
it.polimi.ingsw.Client.View.TUI.ViewStates.InteractiveState
it.polimi.ingsw.Client.View.TUI.ViewStates.ComplexState
Direct Known Subclasses:
LobbyStates
public abstract class ComplexState extends InteractiveState
Represents a complex state that can switch between different interactive components based on user input.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    ComplexState(InteractiveComponent mainComponent)
    Constructs a ComplexState with only a main interactive component.
    ComplexState(InteractiveComponent mainComponent, List<InteractiveComponent> secondaryComponents)
    Constructs a ComplexState with a main interactive component and a list of secondary components.
